org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer

Class ConsumerRecords<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecords<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ConsumerRecord<K,V>>

    public class ConsumerRecords<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<ConsumerRecord<K,V>>
    A container that holds the list ConsumerRecord per partition for a particular topic. There is one for every topic returned by a Consumer.poll(long) operation.
